title: AoaoPhoto Digital Studio Photo Watermark Software 5.2 with CRACK
description:
If you are sharing photos to network, you never know what will happen. Someone could take the photos for their own use,or Malicious revised, you might never even know. AoaoPhoto Digital Studio Watermark Software is a professional photo watermark creator. It can helps you add text,image and logo to your pictures to protect your copyrights, only watermarking software can verifies your pictures are protected from unauthorized use. Our photo watermark software is not only watermarking tool, also can add pretty frames for your like, crop images, batch rename and photo resize etc. Watermark software is a fast batch photo processor and support all popular formats.

Share photos safely.
A digital picture published on the Web is very vulnerable: anybody can copy your image and publish it on its own website. It may happen so that you will never know your images were stolen. No one will pay you a cent!

There are many ways to protect your images:
you can block the Save button or embed the image into a flash movie. Most of them are insecure. They can protect images from ordinary users only. Hackers can easily "crack" protection wrapped around your pictures.

Watermark software embeds a visible watermark directly in your picture.
This watermark consists of some text or a picture, it will replace some parts of the original image and leave hackers no chance to remove it. Therefore, Visual Watermark makes it safe to share images of high quality. They stay colorful and sharp and let your customers know about the details and quality of original images.

Secure Protection - Add text and image to your photos and digital images,will prevent others from removing watermarks and stealing the photos.
Pretty Frames - We provide more a great many frames for you, you can edit it for you want to effects,and these are free.
Fast Watermarking Process - The photo watermark software have a Powerful batch processing function, utilizes a fast second generation engine. add pictures of the form as 800x600 Pixels, can finish it for you in 10 seconds.
Display EXIF Information - Watermark Software is an useful to understand EXIF information from your digital photos. watermark software provides these information to you, include "Camera Name", "Date Time", "F-Nunber" etc.
Support all popular formats - If you add different formats to watermark software, will process them in once, independent of their format.
Photo Resize - If your picture isn't suitable size, you can use the function to Resize ,and keep best effects. Only the our photo watermark software can do it.
